column5: We will be going to LOW near Morson in early Sept. and wonder if there is anyplace to buy leeches in Canada once one crosses the border at Baudette. Randy from Duluth

Greetings,It might be difficult to buy leeches anywhere in NW Ontario in early September as leech season typically winds down by early August. If you find an outlet, consider calling them fairly soon and reserve some leeches for early September. Even then, they might not be in the greatest shape.Good fishing and tight lines!!
I'm up there now I couldn't find any leeches anywhere. Was told leeches are done for the year.
I bought leeches today in Kenora at Sunrise baits. That being said, all the fish we caught today were on minnows, waste of $10.
Thanks for the update. Yes, it is the time of year it gets harder to locate leeches for sale. How about in Fort Francis. We could go through there but I prefer Baudette. Randy from Duluth
That's where I called before I left home. And there the ones who told me that thay couldnt get any more. The big bait shop on 11 just off the lake.
My bait dealer just informed me that leeches are done for the year. I bought his last pound.
